name: % Arabica Toronto | Yorkdale Shopping Centre
address: 3401 Dufferin St, Toronto, ON M6A 2T9, Canada
general_desc:
Toronto is known for its diverse and multicultural population, thriving arts and fashion scene, and its well-known waterfront skyline along the shores of Lake Ontario. After much preparation, we’re happy to open our first store in this amazing city. You can find us at Yorkdale Shopping Centre, which offers the country’s largest collection of designer labels and luxury brands.

This store features a sleek and simple design by no.10 of Nomura, our trusted design partner from Japan, with the focal point being the multiple rows of % bean bags stacked at the center to reach the high ceiling. Using mirrors and glass, the cylindrical centerpiece, along with the kitchen counter and Chemex lighting, create a continuous 360-degree reflection. This eye-catching display adds warmth and vibrance to our familiar minimalist interiors.

This is % Canada. Be sure to stop by our first Canadian location and enjoy a cup of our delicious and timeless coffee. Our friendly and passionate baristas look forward to your visit ***
